#Install Guide

= Introduction =

This is the install guide.  *A work in progress*

= Details =

1.  Download and install Java 5+ (http://java.sun.com/)
2.  Download and install eclipse v3.2 (http://www.eclipse.org)
3.  Install Subclipse plugin (http://subclipse.tigris.org/) and Draw2d and GEF from eclipse.org
4.  Download and install MySQL v5 (http://www.mysql.org)
5.  Connect to the Google Subversion repository and load the projects:
    ** com.ats.client
    ** com.ats.client.runtime
    ** com.ats.model
6.  Create the MySQL database and tables using com.ats.model/create_tables.sql
7.  Run the com.ats.client as an Eclipse Application.  When you get errors,
    edit the runtime configuration to add VM argument "-Xmx256m" and the plugins:

  ** com.ats.model
